NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Tech-savvy Consumers or Budget Shoppers?
NC.A: {Tech-savvy Consumers} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Tech-savvy Consumers or Convenience-Oriented?

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Convenience-Oriented or Tech-savvy Consumers?
